explanation: 该研究论文主要关注土地利用变化对土壤碳储量的影响，并利用大气反演和卫星遥感数据来估算全球土壤碳和凋落物（SOCL）的变化。虽然其核心并非直接研究大气环境遥感技术，但它使用了大气二氧化碳通量反演和基于卫星的生物量变化图等遥感数据，来推断土壤碳的变化。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术存在间接关联，特别是与大气成分分析和卫星观测在陆地生态系统研究中的应用有关。研究结果表明，干旱热带地区因农业扩张导致的土壤碳损失，几乎抵消了北方地区的土壤碳增加，突出了干旱热带地区恢复农业土壤碳的重要性。
topic_words: ['Net land CO2 flux', 'Atmospheric inversions', 'Satellite-based maps of biomass changes', 'Soil carbon changes', 'Global models', 'Boreal regions', 'Dry tropics', 'Wet tropics']
authors: Huan Wang;Philippe Ciais;Hui Yang;Pete Smith;Giacomo Grassi;Clemens Schwingshackl;Panos Panagos;Yinon Bar-On;Stephen Sitch;Frédéric Chevallier;Paul I. Palmer;Xiaojun Li;Songbai Hong;Jinfeng Chang;Clément Albergel;Lei Fan;Kai Wang;Laibao Liu;Frédéric Frappart;Jean-Pierre Wigneron
title: Land use-induced soil carbon loss in the dry tropics nearly offsets gains in northern lands
abstract:
Soil carbon loss from human agriculture-related land use in the dry tropics largely offsets gains in northern lands, leading to a small net sink of 0.34 ± 0.30 PgC yr−1 at a global scale. 
 Soil carbon changes are difficult to measure globally, and global models are poorly constrained. Here, we propose a framework to map annual changes in soil carbon and litter (SOCL) as the difference between the net land CO2 flux from atmospheric inversions and satellite-based maps of biomass changes. We show that SOCL accumulated globally at a rate of about 0.34 ± 0.30 ( ± 1 sigma) billion tonnes of carbon per year (PgC yr−1) during 2011-2020. The largest SOCL sink is found in boreal regions (0.93 ± 0.45 PgC yr−1 in total) particularly in undisturbed peatlands and managed forests. The largest losses occur in the dry tropics (−0.50 ± 0.47 PgC yr−1) and correspond with agricultural expansion from land use change, cropland management and grazing. By contrast, forests in the wet tropics act as a net soil carbon sink (0.32 ± 0.35 PgC yr−1). Our findings highlight the large mitigation opportunities in the dry tropics to restore agricultural soil carbon. Soil carbon loss from human agriculture-related land use in the dry tropics largely offsets gains in northern lands, leading to a small net sink of 0.34 ± 0.30 PgC yr−1 at a global scale.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了通过不同PM2.5减排策略来降低心肺疾病发病率的潜在影响。虽然它没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，但它与空气质量监测密切相关，因为PM2.5的浓度数据是评估减排策略有效性的关键。研究中使用的PM2.5数据可能来源于地面监测站，也可能结合了卫星观测数据，以进行更全面的评估。此外，该研究还涉及大气成分分析，特别是PM2.5的来源和组成，以便制定更有效的减排策略。因此，虽然不是直接研究遥感技术，但与遥感在空气质量监测和大气成分分析方面的应用有很强的关联性。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'Air quality monitoring', 'Health impact assessment', 'Emission reduction scenarios', 'Cardiopulmonary disease', 'Global health', 'Climate mitigation']
authors: Eartha Weber;Vassilis Daioglou;Laszlo Vreedenburgh;Jonathan Doelman;George Downward;Maria Gabriela Matias de Pinho;Detlef van Vuuren
title: Modelling PM<sub>2.5</sub> reduction scenarios for future cardiopulmonary disease reduction
abstract:
Exposure to air pollution poses a substantial risk to health, contributing to high rates of cardiovascular and respiratory mortality. A study now evaluates the health impacts of different PM2.5 reduction strategies, providing evidence of their effectiveness across different regions and timeframes. 
 Long-term PM2.5 exposure is a risk factor for cardiovascular and respiratory mortality. Here a global health impact assessment was conducted utilizing seven future scenarios evaluating strategies to reduce PM2.5 exposure. Strategies included reducing fossil fuel use, air pollution control, adopting cleaner cooking methods and combinations thereof. Under current trends, air quality is projected to improve by 2050; nevertheless, the absolute attributable burden of ischaemic heart disease, stroke and chronic obstructive pulmonary disease remains high in many regions. Cleaner cooking fuel use is effective in the short term (by 2030) in South and Central America, Asia, and Africa for reducing PM2.5-related deaths. In the long term (by 2050) for most regions, only strategies that simultaneously target ambient and cooking-related PM2.5 resulted in sustained improvements that expand beyond current trends for reducing disease burden across these three health outcomes. In the Asian region, for example, under current trends, the population-attributable fraction decreases from 35% in 2015 to 18% in 2050. In the scenario combining universal clean cooking and climate policy, it drops further to 15%, and when all strategies are combined, it reaches as low as 11% by 2050. With all strategies combined, the average global population-weighted PM2.5 exposure from both ambient and cooking sources is reduced by nearly two-thirds (66 µg m−3 compared with 26 µg m−3). For North Africa and the Middle East region, the population-attributable fraction remains high across all scenarios. Additional strategies beyond those mentioned here are required to further improve air quality. It is recommended to pursue climate mitigation alongside universal access to cleaner household fuels to maximize cardiopulmonary health benefits. Exposure to air pollution poses a substantial risk to health, contributing to high rates of cardiovascular and respiratory mortality. A study now evaluates the health impacts of different PM2.5 reduction strategies, providing evidence of their effectiveness across different regions and timeframes.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了土地覆盖数据集的分辨率对北极和北方湿地甲烷排放预算的影响。虽然它没有直接涉及大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测，但它确实与卫星观测相关，因为土地覆盖地图通常是基于卫星数据生成的。该研究表明，粗糙分辨率的土地覆盖地图会严重影响甲烷排放的估算，导致对湿地是甲烷源还是汇的错误分类。研究强调了使用高分辨率和具有生物地球化学相关性的土地覆盖类型对于可靠地估算甲烷排放的重要性。因此，虽然不是直接的大气遥感研究，但它对使用遥感数据（如卫星图像）来理解和模拟大气成分（特别是甲烷）具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['methane', 'CH4 emissions', 'wetland distribution', 'land cover map resolution', 'Arctic-Boreal wetlands', 'remote sensing (indirectly via land cover maps)', 'satellite observations (indirectly via land cover maps)']
authors: Josh Hashemi;Aleksi Räsänen;Tarmo Virtanen;Sari Juutinen;Guido Grosse;Mika Aurela;Annett Bartsch;Laura Chasmer;Scott J. Davidson;Mika Korkiakoski;McKenzie A. Kuhn;Mark J. Lara;Miska Luoto;Pekka Niittynen;David Olefeldt;Oliver Sonnentag;Anna-Maria Virkkala;Carolina Voigt;Claire C. Treat
title: Coarse land cover datasets bias Arctic-Boreal wetland methane budgets
abstract:
Estimation of methane flux remained within 13% error at a resolution within 25 m, but resolutions coarser than 1 km often misclassified sites as methane sources instead of sinks, based on high-resolution analysis across seven Arctic and boreal sites in North America and Eurasia. 
 Accurate methane (CH4) emission estimates from Arctic and boreal wetlands are essential for reducing global budget uncertainties but are hindered by poorly constrained wetland distribution and classification. We assessed how land cover map resolution and thematic detail influence these estimates. Using very high spatial resolution land cover maps (≤2.5 m) with five to seven harmonized classes and 4–50% wetland coverage, we estimated CH4 emissions across seven Arctic and boreal sites in North America and Eurasia. Resampling to coarser resolutions (up to 5 km) revealed that CH4 flux estimates remained within 13% error when resolution was ≤25 m pixel size. At resolutions coarser than 1 km, four of seven sites shifted from net CH4 source to sink, due to misrepresentation of wetland extent in heterogeneous landscapes with small, fragmented wetlands. Thematic detail also proved critical, as fens—high CH4 emitters—were disproportionately underrepresented in coarse (>1 km) maps relative to other wetland types. We also show that existing global or circumpolar land cover maps tend to misrepresent wetlands, either overlooking smaller features or overestimating coverage in wetland dominated areas. Our findings indicate that coarse-scale land cover datasets are unsuitable for estimating CH4 budgets in these regions, where high spatial resolution and biogeochemically relevant land cover classes are essential for reliable CH4 emission upscaling. Estimation of methane flux remained within 13% error at a resolution within 25 m, but resolutions coarser than 1 km often misclassified sites as methane sources instead of sinks, based on high-resolution analysis across seven Arctic and boreal sites in North America and Eurasia.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了航空燃料中的硫含量对飞机尾迹冰晶数量的影响。通过对空客A350-900燃烧不同硫含量燃料的飞行测量，发现低硫燃料会减少挥发性颗粒物和尾迹冰晶的数量。研究表明，较高的燃料硫含量会通过硫酸盐气溶胶的活化增加尾迹冰晶的数量。这项研究与大气环境遥感技术相关，因为它涉及大气成分分析（如挥发性颗粒物、硫酸盐气溶胶）以及航空排放对气候的影响，这些都可以通过卫星观测等遥感技术进行监测和研究。虽然论文没有直接提及特定的遥感技术，但其研究结果对于利用遥感数据评估航空业对大气环境的影响具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['contrails', 'ice crystals', 'fuel sulfur content', 'volatile particles', 'sulfate aerosols', 'aviation emissions', 'radiative forcing', 'climate impact']
authors: Rebecca Dischl;Raphael Märkl;Daniel Sauer;Christiane Voigt;Theresa Harlaß;Monika Scheibe;Valerian Hahn;Stefan Kaufmann;Andreas Marsing;Andreas Dörnbrack;Anke Roiger;Fangqun Yu;Maxime Gauthier;Charles Renard;Peter Swann;Mark Johnson;Denise Ahrens;Reetu Sallinen;Georg Eckel;Patrick Le Clercq
title: Fuel sulfur content can modulate contrail ice crystal numbers
abstract:
The number of contrail ice crystals can be tuned by adjusting the fuel’s sulfur content, as shown by in-flight measurements of emissions and contrails from an Airbus A350-900 burning different fuels. 
 In recent efforts to reduce the radiative forcing of aviation, fuel design has gained increased attention. Sustainable Aviation Fuels are seeing wider adoption, and their positive impact on carbon dioxide and non-volatile soot particle emissions is well-established. However, the effects of the reduction in fuel sulfur content on volatile particle emissions and contrails are unknown. This study presents observations from in-flight measurements of emissions and contrails of an Airbus A350-900 burning fuels with different sulfur contents. We find a reduction in volatile particles and contrail ice crystals for low-sulfur fuels. For higher fuel sulfur contents, our findings demonstrate an additional contrail ice particle source through activation of sulfate aerosols. Our data-driven results need to be consolidated by in-flight observations with different fuels and engines. Eventually, climate impact estimates as well as regulations should account for the modulating effect of the fuel sulfur content on contrail ice particle numbers. The number of contrail ice crystals can be tuned by adjusting the fuel’s sulfur content, as shown by in-flight measurements of emissions and contrails from an Airbus A350-900 burning different fuels.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了船舶排放对气候的影响，重点关注船舶尾迹产生的气溶胶间接辐射强迫。研究发现，可见船舶尾迹仅占东南大西洋航运线总辐射强迫的5%。文章结合了自下而上和自上而下的数据分析方法，包括机器学习检测船舶尾迹、空间关系分析以及云调整模型。研究结果表明，大部分船舶排放产生的辐射强迫来自未形成可见船舶尾迹的气溶胶。该研究对于理解气溶胶间接辐射强迫以及海洋云增亮具有重要意义，并暗示了卫星观测和遥感技术在监测和评估船舶排放影响方面的应用。
topic_words: ['aerosol indirect forcing', 'ship emissions', 'ship tracks', 'air quality', 'climate forcing', 'cloud droplet number concentration', 'cloud adjustments', 'satellite observations (implied)', 'remote sensing (implied)']
authors: Tianle Yuan;Hua Song;Lili F. Boss;Michael S. Diamond
title: Detectable ship tracks account for just 5% of aerosol indirect forcing from ship emissions
abstract:
Aerosol indirect forcing due to visible ship-tracks accounts for just 5% of the total forcing over the southeast Atlantic shipping-lane, according to analyses of bottom-up and top-down data from the southeast Atlantic. 
 Ship emissions are a major source of aerosols over oceans, affecting both air quality and energy balance of the climate. However, estimates of their climate forcing diverge between studies relying on visible ship-tracks and those based on models. Here we show that forcing due to visible ship-tracks accounts for just 5% of the total forcing over the southeast Atlantic shipping-lane. Most forcing from ship emissions comes from aerosols that do not form detectable ship-tracks. They are only tips of the iceberg. We make three forcing calculations, one bottom-up based on visible ship-tracks, one top-down based on spatial relationships, and a hybrid approach that combines top-down or model estimated cloud droplet number concentration changes and cloud adjustments. Although the forcing based on machine learning detected ship tracks is an order of magnitude greater than prior results using manually detected ship-tracks, it remains only 5% of that inferred by top-down or cloud adjustment based methods for pre-2020 shipping. The top-down and the combined cloud adjustments methods show similar forcing for the post-2020 reduction in ships’ sulfur emission, although the methods have important regional differences in cloud adjustments that need further investigation. Our results reconcile a long-standing discrepancy in the literature and have important implications for aerosol indirect forcing and marine cloud brightening. Aerosol indirect forcing due to visible ship-tracks accounts for just 5% of the total forcing over the southeast Atlantic shipping-lane, according to analyses of bottom-up and top-down data from the southeast Atlantic.

explanation: 该研究论文通过卫星观测和冰核化模型，分析了2022年汤加火山爆发后大气波产生的瞬时冰环现象。研究表明，火山爆发引发的大气波导致高空大气温度振荡，促使微小冰粒在高空形成环状结构。这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星观测来研究火山爆发对大气成分和结构的影响，特别是冰晶的形成和分布，以及大气波的传播。这有助于我们理解火山爆发等自然事件如何影响大气环境，并为大气成分分析和气候模型提供数据。
topic_words: ['satellite observations', 'atmospheric waves', 'ice particle formation', 'upper troposphere-lower stratosphere', 'volcanic eruption', 'atmospheric temperature oscillations']
authors: Andrew T. Prata;Roy G. Grainger;Isabelle A. Taylor;Alyn Lambert
title: Transient ice ring observed during the 15 January 2022 eruption of Hunga volcano
abstract:
Ambient temperature oscillations in the wake of an atmospheric wave generated by the eruption of Hunga volcano in 2022 formed a temporary ring of small ice particles in the upper troposphere-lower stratosphere, according to satellite observations and ice nucleation modelling. 
 The eruption of Hunga volcano on 15 January 2022 was an exceptional event in the satellite era. Record-breaking heights of the volcanic plume were reported, a large amount of water was injected into the stratosphere and a broad spectrum of atmospheric waves were detected. Here, we use satellite measurements to show that a transient ring of small ice particles (~2 μm) formed around the plume. We hypothesize that the ice ring was generated by the passage of an atmospheric wave triggered by a pressure pulse at the surface corresponding to a violent explosion that occurred during the 15 January 2022 eruption sequence. The passage of the atmospheric wave produced a transient rarefaction in the upper troposphere-lower stratosphere, which in turn led to oscillations in ambient temperature. Due to the supersaturated state of the atmosphere with respect to ice, ice particles formed in the wake of the radially propagating atmospheric wave, allowing an exceptional opportunity to study ice particle growth via vapour deposition. This atmospheric phenomenon serves as an important natural experiment that reveals the time scale on which ice particles nucleate and grow given an abrupt perturbation in ambient temperature. Ambient temperature oscillations in the wake of an atmospheric wave generated by the eruption of Hunga volcano in 2022 formed a temporary ring of small ice particles in the upper troposphere-lower stratosphere, according to satellite observations and ice nucleation modelling.

explanation: 该研究论文开发了一个名为RMT-PAS的系统，该系统基于趋势分解可解释机器学习方法，用于分离和量化气象条件和人为排放对环境PM2.5和O3水平的影响。该系统通过集成XGBoost、LightGBM和CatBoost模型，建立了PM2.5/O3污染水平与多种气象因素以及排放成分之间的非线性响应关系，并实现了较高的预测精度。研究结果表明，人为排放的减少对PM2.5的降低有显著影响，而气象条件对O3的影响则表现出较强的区域异质性。此外，研究还分析了典型污染事件中PM2.5和O3的主要驱动因素。该系统可为政府和环境监管机构提供长期评估和实施有效控制措施的支持。
topic_words: ['air quality monitoring', 'PM2.5', 'O3', 'meteorological factors', 'anthropogenic emissions', 'machine learning', 'pollution events', 'trend decomposition', 'contribution analysis']
authors: Huabing Ke;Sunling Gong;Yaqiang Wang;Lei Zhang;Jingyue Mo;Jiayu Yang;Chao Wang;Chunhong Zhou
title: Separation of meteorological and anthropogenic contributions to major ambient pollutants using an integrated explainable machine learning framework: RMT-PAS
abstract:
•RMT-PAS enables accurate nonlinear prediction through stacking ensemble technique. •RMT-PAS performs multi-scale contribution analysis using trend-decomposition explainable ML. •MET impacts on PM2.5fluctuated most in winter, while O3peaked in summer. •Pollution events showed PM2.5driven by PBLH, RHU, PRS_Sea, and O3by TEM and RHU. 
 In this study, a Rapid Multi-Temporal Pollution Assessment System (RMT-PAS) has been developed based on a trend-decomposition explainable machine learning (ML) method, which was used to isolate and quantify the contributions of meteorology (MET) and anthropogenic emissions (EMIS) to the ambient PM2.5/O3 levels at different scales such as inter-annual, seasonal and typical pollution events. The RMT-PAS employed a stacking ensemble technique integrating the XGBoost, LightGBM, and CatBoost models to establish the nonlinear response relationship between PM2.5/O3 pollution levels and multiple meteorological elements as well as emission components, and achieved high predictive accuracy. Inter-annual analysis (2015–2020) showed that reductions in EMIS accounted for 53.1 %–158.9 % of the observed decreases in annual-mean PM2.5, whereas for O3 the MET contribution increased substantially and displayed strong regional heterogeneity (−126.5 % to +48.6 %). Seasonal analyses indicated that MET contributions to PM2.5 exhibited the greatest fluctuation in winter, followed by autumn, spring, and summer (mean standard deviations: 5.13, 3.82, 2.95, and 2.00 μg/m3). In contrast, for O3, the highest fluctuation occurred in summer, followed by autumn, spring, and winter (5.72, 4.70, 3.48, and 2.11 μg/m3). The analysis of typical pollution events further revealed that PM2.5 pollution were mainly driven by boundary layer height (PBLH), relative humidity (RHU) and sea-level pressure (PRS_Sea), whereas O3 pollution were primarily controlled by temperature (TEM) and RHU. The developed RMT-PAS system can support government and environmental regulators in conducting long-term assessments and implementing timely, effective control measures during emergency events.

explanation: 该研究论文分析了印度Gadanki地区热带对流层顶反演层（TIL）的年代际变化及其辐射驱动因素。它利用2006年至2024年的无线电探空仪数据，研究了对流层顶高度、TIL宽度和强度的变化趋势。研究发现，对流层顶高度呈正趋势，而TIL宽度和强度呈负趋势，表明未来气候变暖可能导致TIL变弱变窄。此外，论文还分析了臭氧和水汽对UTLS区域加热率的影响，发现夏季更强更窄的TIL是由于臭氧在LS中的辐射加热和水汽在UT中的冷却造成的。这项研究首次提供了热带地区辐射强迫对TIL形成和维持的观测证据，与大气成分分析和气候变化密切相关。
topic_words: ['Tropopause Inversion Layer (TIL)', 'Radiosonde data', 'Ozone', 'Water vapor', 'UTLS (Upper Troposphere and Lower Stratosphere)', 'Radiative forcing', 'Climate change', 'Atmospheric composition']
authors: K.P. Aathira;M. Pramitha;B.L. Madhavan;M. Venkat Ratnam
title: Decadal changes in the Tropical Tropopause Inversion Layer and its radiative drivers over Gadanki (2006–2024)
abstract:
•A warming climate in the future, results in a weaker and narrower TIL. •A strong temperature inversion in the UTLS could result in a stronger TIL in summer. •The formation of TIL can be influenced by other dynamical processes. 
 The upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS), due to their minimum temperature, play an important role in radiation escaping to space and, thus, climate feedback. The tropopause, separating the well-mixed troposphere and the stably stratified stratosphere, is a good indicator of climate change, as it is sensitive to the concentration of radiatively active species. A highly stable layer above the tropopause, the Tropopause Inversion Layer (TIL), was confirmed to exist across all latitudes and seasons. Studying the TIL is essential for understanding the composition of the UTLS. The trends in key TIL parameters, the width and strength, and the radiative effects of water vapor and ozone on TIL formation over the tropical station, Gadanki (13.5oN, 79.2°E), India, based on radiosonde data spanning from 2006 to 2024, are investigated. The tropopause height shows a positive trend of 0.08 ± 0.06 km/decade, suggesting a future climate warming with a weaker and narrower TIL, as indicated by the negative trend in TIL width (−0.2 ± 0.07 km/decade) and TIL strength (−1.35*10−5 ± 1.63*10−5 km/decade). A heating rate analysis in the UTLS region due to ozone and water vapor reveals that, the stronger and narrower TIL in summer is a result of radiative heating due to ozone in LS and cooling due to water vapor in UT, leading to an enhanced temperature inversion, and modulating the UTLS, potentially impacting climate change via tropopause. Present study provides the first time observational evidence of radiative forcing on TIL formation and maintenance over a tropical station for summer.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要都表明其与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。该研究提出了一种新的方法，通过模拟NOx化学来估计化石燃料CO2（ffCO2）的排放量。该方法利用气象输入参数化NOx化学反应速率和NO2:NO比率，并与卫星数据（如TROPOMI）进行比较。该研究旨在提高ffCO2估算的准确性，并支持全球排放监测和气候变化减缓工作。因此，该研究与空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等大气环境遥感技术密切相关。
topic_words: ['NOx', 'Fossil Fuel CO2 Emissions', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Satellite Observations (TROPOMI)', 'Atmospheric Composition Analysis (NO2:NO ratio)', 'Model Inversion', 'Photochemistry']
authors: Chlöe N. Schooling;Paul I. Palmer;Auke Visser;Nicolas Bousserez
title: Development of a parametrised atmospheric NOx chemistry scheme to help quantify fossil fuel CO2 emission estimates
abstract:
This study presents a new method to estimate fossil fuel CO2 (ffCO2) emissions by modelling NOx chemistry. Our regression models predict NOx chemical rates and NO2 : NO ratios with R² values above 0.95 using meteorological inputs. Incorporating these regressions reduces computational time compared to traditional methods and enables integration into model inversion frameworks. This scalable approach supports global emissions monitoring and climate change mitigation efforts. 
 Success of the Paris Agreement relies on rapid reductions in fossil fuel CO2 (ffCO2) emissions. Atmospheric data can verify the ffCO2 reductions pledged by nations in their nationally determined contributions. However, estimating ffCO2 from atmospheric CO2 is challenging due to natural fluxes and varying backgrounds. One approach is to combine with nitrogen oxides (NOx = NO + NO2), which are co-emitted with CO2 during combustion. A key challenge in using NOx to estimate ffCO2 is the computational cost of modelling atmospheric photochemistry. Additionally, the NO2 : NO column ratio must be well understood to convert model NOx columns to NO2 columns for comparison with satellite data. We use random forest regression to parameterise NOx chemistry, relying only on meteorological parameters and NOx concentration. The regression is trained on outputs from a nested GEOS (Goddard Earth Observing System)-Chem model simulation for mainland Europe in 2019. We develop a monthly NOx chemistry parameterisation that performs well when tested on perturbed emission runs (R2 > 0.95) and on unseen meteorology for 2021 (R2 > 0.79). We also parameterise the NO2 : NO ratio (R2 > 0.99 on perturbed outputs, R2 > 0.92 on unseen meteorology). Additionally, we present an alternative method to predict NOx rates by scaling baseline NOx rates with changes in NOx concentration (R2 = 1.0 on perturbed outputs). Our models reproduce NO2 columns with minimal deviation from full-chemistry models, with reconstruction error smaller than the TROPOspheric Monitoring Instrument (TROPOMI) precision in over 99.9 % of cases, supporting robust ffCO2 inversion efforts. These results provide a robust framework for accurately estimating fossil fuel CO2 emissions from atmospheric data, enabling more reliable monitoring and verification of global emissions reductions.

explanation: 这篇研究论文主要关注纽约市的甲烷排放问题。研究人员通过六年的冬季到春季的连续屋顶观测数据，发现纽约市的甲烷排放量被排放清单低估，尤其是在冬季。研究结果表明，甲烷和一氧化碳可能存在共同的城市不完全燃烧源，而目前的排放清单中缺少对这一来源的考虑。该研究使用了连续测量方法，揭示了城市甲烷排放的日变化规律，并强调了长期、多物种方法在约束城市温室气体排放及其来源方面的作用。虽然论文主要依赖于地面观测，但提到了飞机和卫星观测，因此与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）密切相关。
topic_words: ['methane emissions', 'carbon monoxide', 'urban emissions', 'emission inventories', 'rooftop measurements', 'incomplete combustion', 'air quality monitoring', 'satellite observations (mentioned)', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Luke D. Schiferl;Andrew Hallward-Driemeier;Yuwei Zhao;Ricardo Toledo-Crow;Róisín Commane
title: Missing wintertime methane emissions from  New York City related to combustion
abstract:
Identifying and quantifying methane emissions from urban sources is important for mitigating climate change. Using 6 years of winter and spring observations, we found that methane emissions from New York City are highly variable and underestimated compared to inventories, especially in winter, and correlate well with emissions of carbon monoxide (CO). Our results suggest a common urban incomplete combustion source for both methane and CO currently missing from emissions inventories. 
 Accurately quantifying methane emissions from cities, and understanding the processes that drive these emissions, is important for reaching climate mitigation goals. Methane emissions from New York City metropolitan area (NYCMA), the most populous urban area of the United States, have consistently been underestimated by emission inventories compared to aircraft and satellite observations. In this study, we used continuous rooftop measurements of methane over six winter-to-spring transitions (January–May 2019–2024) to examine the variability of city-scale methane enhancements (ΔCH4) and estimate methane emissions from the NYCMA. We found large variability in the 10 d mean observed ΔCH4 (∼50–250 ppbv) and monthly afternoon methane emissions rates (10.1–30.4 kg s−1) within and between the years of our study period. A recently released high-resolution regional methane emission inventory developed for the NYCMA performed better than other global and national inventories against the rooftop observations but still underestimated methane emissions, especially in winter. The estimates of methane emissions correlated with those of carbon monoxide (CO) emissions, determined from coincident measurements, suggesting a common city-scale incomplete combustion source for both methane and CO. Our analysis of these continuous measurements also implies a consistent diurnal cycle in urban methane emissions from the NYCMA, which reveals a potential bias in traditional afternoon-only approaches in this domain. This work highlights the usefulness of a long term, multi-species approach to constrain urban greenhouse gas emissions and their sources.

explanation: 这篇论文主要研究了亚洲地区生物质燃烧排放物对大气环境的影响。研究利用温室气体增强比率、痕量气体和颗粒散射等机载测量数据，识别了受生物质燃烧影响的空气团。此外，还使用了大气传输模型和卫星热点产品来分析生物质燃烧排放物的传输历史。论文重点介绍了在ASIA-AQ（亚洲空气质量机载和卫星调查）活动期间，特别是在泰国地区，生物质燃烧的影响。该研究开发了一种方法，通过结合多种生物质燃烧标记物来识别受生物质燃烧影响的数据，并为进一步的分析（如反向轨迹分析、卫星热点产品对比和气溶胶微物理特性研究）提供依据。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，涉及空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等领域。
topic_words: ['biomass burning emissions', 'greenhouse gases', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric transport models', 'satellite hotspot products', 'trace gases', 'particle scattering', 'ASIA-AQ campaign', 'GEMS (Geostationary Environment Monitoring Spectrometer)']
authors: Jason A. Miech;Joshua P. DiGangi;Glenn S. Diskin;Yonghoon Choi;Richard H. Moore;Luke D. Ziemba;Francesca Gallo;Carolyn E. Jordan;Michael A. Shook;Elizabeth B. Wiggins;Edward L. Winstead;Sayantee Roy;Young Ro Lee;Katherine Ball;John D. Crounse;Paul Wennberg;Felix Piel;Stefan Swift;Wojciech Wojnowski;Armin Wisthaler
title: Technical note: Identifying biomass burning emissions during ASIA-AQ using greenhouse gas enhancement ratios
abstract:
Biomass burning is a significant source of greenhouse gases and airborne pollutants in Asia. Airborne measurements of greenhouse gas enhancement ratios, trace gases, and particle scattering were used to identify air masses impacted by biomass burning over several Asian countries during February and March of 2024. Further analysis using atmospheric transport models and satellite hotspot products was performed to understand the transport history of biomass burning impacted airmasses over Thailand. 
 Biomass burning (BB) is a primary source of atmospheric chemistry reactants, aerosols, and greenhouse gases. Smoke plumes have air quality impacts local to the fire itself and regionally via long distance transport. Open burning of agriculture fields in Southeast Asia leads to frequent seasonal occurrences of regional BB-induced smoke haze and long-range transport of BB particles via the northeast monsoon. The Airborne and Satellite Investigation of Asian Air Quality (ASIA-AQ) campaign visited several areas including the Philippines, South Korea, Thailand, and Taiwan during a time of agricultural burning. This campaign consisted of airborne measurements on the NASA DC-8 aircraft aimed to validate observations from South Korea's Geostationary Environment Monitoring Spectrometer (GEMS) and to address local air quality challenges. We developed a method that used a combination of BB markers to identify ASIA-AQ DC-8 data influenced by BB and flag them for further analysis. Specifically, we used rolling slope enhancement ratios of CO/CO2 and CH4/CO along with mixing ratios of CH3CN, HCN, and CO, and particle scattering coefficient measurements. The flag was triggered when a combination of these variables exceeded a flight specific threshold. We found varying levels of BB-influence in the areas studied, with data flagged for BB being < 1 % for the Philippines and Korea, and < 2 % for Taiwan, but 19 % for Thailand. Our method for flagging ASIA-AQ BB-affected data can be used to focus additional analyses of the ASIA-AQ campaign such as pairing with back trajectories, satellite hotspot products, and microphysical aerosol characteristics.

explanation: 该研究论文主要探讨了二氧化碳（CO2）在对流层上部和低层平流层（UTLS）中的分布和季节性变化。它结合了EMAC模型模拟和AirCore观测数据，通过模拟人工示踪剂来分离CO2的季节性信号、长期趋势和传输变化。研究发现，季节性信号的模式与大型传输特征有关，如副热带急流或Brewer-Dobson环流。该研究强调了所提出的示踪剂作为模型间比较的强大诊断工具的潜力。虽然没有直接提到卫星观测或特定的遥感技术，但它与大气成分分析密切相关，并且对理解大气传输过程和气候模型验证具有重要意义。
topic_words: ['CO2', 'Upper Troposphere Lower Stratosphere (UTLS)', 'Atmospheric Transport', 'Brewer-Dobson Circulation', 'AirCore', 'EMAC Model', 'Atmospheric Composition Analysis']
authors: Johannes Degen;Bianca C. Baier;Patrick Jöckel;J. Moritz Menken;Tanja J. Schuck;Colm Sweeney;Andreas Engel
title: CO2 variability and seasonal cycle in the UTLS: insights from EMAC model and AirCore observational data
abstract:
We investigate the distribution of CO2 in the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere using both, observations and an atmospheric model. Simulating an artificial tracer, we separate CO2 seasonality from long-term trend and transport variability. We found that patterns in the seasonal signal are attributable to large-scale transport features like the subtropical jet or the Brewer-Dobson circulation. Being a powerful diagnostic tool we recommend to use this tracer for model intercomparisons. 
 The complex distribution of CO2 in the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS) results from the interplay of different processes and mechanisms. However, in such difficult-to-access regions of the atmosphere our understanding of the CO2 variability remains limited. Using vertical trace gas profiles derived from measurements with the balloon-based AirCore technique for validation, we investigate the UTLS and stratospheric CO2 distribution simulated with the ECHAM/MESSy Atmospheric Chemistry (EMAC) global chemistry-climate model. By simulating an artificial, deseasonalised CO2 tracer, we disentangle the CO2 seasonal signal from long-term trend and transport contribution. This approach allows us to study the CO2 seasonal cycle in a unique way in remote areas and on a global scale. Our results show that the tropospheric CO2 seasonal cycle propagates upwards into the lowermost stratosphere and is most modulated in the extra-tropics between 300–100 hPa, characterised by a 50 % amplitude dampening and a 4-month phase shift in the Northern Hemisphere mid-latitudes. During this propagation the seasonal cycle shape is also tilted, which is associated with the transport barrier related to the strength of the subtropical jet. In the stratosphere, we identified both, a vertical and a horizontal “tape recorder” of the CO2 seasonal cycle. Originating in the tropical tropopause region this imprint is linked to the upwelling and the shallow branch of the Brewer-Dobson-circulation. As the CO2 seasonal signal carries information about transport processes on different timescales, the newly introduced tracer is a very useful diagnostic tool and would also be a suitable metric for model intercomparisons.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了北极边界层中臭氧损耗事件的模拟挑战，使用了ECHAM/MESSy模型，并结合了ERA5再分析数据。研究评估了模型结果与地表臭氧测量值、卫星衍生的对流层BrO垂直柱浓度以及MOSAiC考察的现场数据的对比。论文发现模型在模拟强烈的臭氧损耗事件方面存在不足，并探讨了海冰变化和气候因素对臭氧化学的影响。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它使用了卫星观测数据（如对流层BrO垂直柱浓度）来验证模型结果，并涉及大气成分分析和空气质量监测等主题。
topic_words: ['ozone depletion events', 'bromine monoxide', 'Arctic boundary layer', 'ECHAM/MESSy model', 'ERA5 reanalysis', 'tropospheric BrO vertical column densities', 'satellite observations', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition analysis']
authors: Stefanie Falk;Luca Reißig;Bianca Zilker;Andreas Richter;Björn-Martin Sinnhuber
title: Challenges in simulating ozone depletion events in the Arctic boundary layer: a case study using ECHAM/MESSy for spring 2019/2020
abstract:
Ozone depletion events (ODEs) and bromine explosions in the Arctic were studied for 2019/20. Our model underestimated boundary layer height and showed warm biases, affecting ODE simulation. Updates improved coastal ozone agreement but failed to capture strong ODEs. Bromine monoxide (BrO) was overestimated at the surface yet underestimated in columns. Long-term data show declining strong ODEs since 2008, suggesting additional climate-driven factors beyond sea ice age. 
 Ozone depletion events (ODEs) and bromine explosions (BEs) occur regularly in the springtime polar boundary layer. ODEs alter the oxidation capacity of the polar boundary layer and promote formation of toxic mercury. We investigated Arctic ODEs and BEs in 2019/2020 using the chemistry-climate model ECHAM/MESSy v2.55.2, nudged with ERA5 reanalysis data. Model results were evaluated against surface ozone measurements, satellite-derived tropospheric BrO vertical column densities (VCDs), and in situ data from the MOSAiC expedition. The model underestimated boundary layer (BL) height during shallow BL conditions, coinciding with a warm surface temperature bias (2–10 K), particularly below −10 °C, likely inherited from ERA5. An updated model configuration, incorporating more realistic multi-year sea ice and relaxed bromine release thresholds, improved agreement with coastal ozone observations (Eureka, Utqiaġvik) but still failed to reproduce strong ODEs observed during MOSAiC. Consequently, modeled surface BrO mixing ratios were overestimated, while BrO VCDs were underestimated, suggesting that simply increasing Br2 emissions does not resolve discrepancies. A weaker colocation between modeled BrO VCDs and ODEs aligns with prior airborne studies and may reflect tropospheric chemical and transport processes rather than stratospheric contributions. Despite decreasing Arctic sea ice extent and increasing BrO VCDs, long-term records from Alert, Utqiaġvik, and Zeppelin show a decline in strong ODE frequency since 2008. This suggests that bromine emissions from first-year sea ice alone may not fully account for observed ODE variability, and that additional climate-sensitive mechanisms may modulate Arctic ozone chemistry. Long-term model integrations are recommended to better understand these trends.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注使用Ka波段雷达探测大气中的多模态多普勒谱，并利用线性退极化比（LDR）来识别冰晶和毛毛雨等。通过分析三年垂直指向雷达数据，验证了检测算法的有效性，并结合ERA5再分析数据，探讨了与这些多模态谱相关的微物理过程，例如冰晶生长和初级冰核形成。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它使用了雷达技术来研究大气成分和过程。
topic_words: ['Ka-band radar', 'Doppler spectra', 'Multi-modal spectra', 'Linear depolarization ratio (LDR)', 'Microphysical processes', 'Ice crystal detection', 'Drizzle detection', 'Temperature profiling', 'ERA5 reanalysis data']
authors: Sarah Wugofski;Matthew R. Kumjian
title: Detection of Multi-Modal Doppler Spectra – Part 2: Evaluation of the Detection Algorithm and Exploring Characteristics of Multi-modal Spectra Using a Long-term Dataset
abstract:
We demonstrate the detection algorithm is successful, with 89.6 % of events verifying. Using this radar moment-based algorithm will save users time and computational expenses of processing large spectral datasets when looking for case studies of processes associated with multi-modal spectra. Storing linear depolarization ratio for detected events can facilitate finding cases specific to ice or drizzle events. Pairing this with temperature helps determine processes that may be active. 
 In this paper, we process three years of vertically pointing Ka-band radar spectral data according to the methodology described and established in Part 1 (Wugofski et al., 2025). Across three years of data, we demonstrate that the detection algorithm is successful in identifying multi-modal spectra, with 89.6 % of detected events verifying. Beyond the verification, we explore other characteristics of the detected events such as the height, depth, and temperature of the layers containing secondary modes. Reanalysis data from ERA5 was used to gain additional context to the environmental conditions associated with the detected events. By connecting temperatures from ERA5 with the detected layers, we assess the potential for these events to be associated with common microphysical processes such as growth of columns or plates, Hallett–Mossop rime splintering, dendritic growth, and primary ice nucleation. We further explore the potential microphysical processes revealed by the multi-modal spectra using spectrally integrated linear depolarization ratio to determine if the secondary mode may comprise ice crystals that can produce such a signal. Of the cases with a detected enhanced LDR signal, >64.1 % of those occurred in a layer with a mean temperature consistent with columnar ice or Hallett–Mossop rime splintering. Finally, three cases are investigated in more detail to illustrate the variety of events detected by the algorithm.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用日本的地球静止卫星Himawari-8的数据，通过改进的GRASP算法来反演东亚和西太平洋地区的气溶胶和地表性质，从而实现对空气污染的监测。论文验证了反演结果与地面观测数据的一致性，并探讨了卫星数据与地面激光雷达数据协同反演的可能性，以进一步提高气溶胶反演的精度。研究内容与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析密切相关。
topic_words: ['aerosol', 'air quality monitoring', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'Himawari-8', 'GRASP algorithm', 'AOD (Aerosol Optical Depth)', 'surface properties', 'multi-pixel retrieval', 'synergetic retrieval', 'lidar']
authors: Chong Li;Oleg Dubovik;Jing Li;David Fuertes;Anton Lopatin;Pavel Litvinov;Tatsiana Lapyonok;Lukas Bindreiter;Christian Matar;Yiqi Chu;Wangshu Tan
title: Retrieval and validation of diurnal properties of aerosol and surface from geostationary satellite Himawari-8 using multi-pixel approach
abstract:
Using observational data from Japan's geostationary satellite – Himawari-8 , this study improved how we track air pollution (aerosols) across East Asia and the Western Pacific. By applying an advanced aerosol retrieval algorithm called GRASP, we were able to more accurately observe both atmospheric and ground conditions and their dynamics over time. The results closely matched ground-based measurements and showed potential for even better monitoring when combined with ground-based lidar data. 
 The Advanced Himawari Imager (AHI) onboard the Himawari-8 geostationary satellite is an imager with 16 spectral bands covering from the visible to infrared. The AHI has high temporal resolution with observation frequency of every 10 min and high spatial resolution 0.5–2 km (depending on channel) for full disk, which provides great potential for studying the dynamics of aerosol properties in East Asia and Western Pacific regions. In this study, the development of aerosol and surface property retrievals from the AHI/Himawari-8 using the Generalized Retrieval of Atmosphere and Surface Properties (GRASP) algorithm is described. Due to the pseudo multi-angular observations obtained from AHI/Himawari-8 and the flexibility of GRASP algorithm with its innovative multi-pixel concept, multiple time and spatial pixels were retrieved simultaneously with both aerosol and surface properties constrained between the pixels together with additional constraints on spectral variability of underlying surface parameters within each pixel.The developed GRASP based algorithm has been applied to AHI/Himwari-8 observations over land for the entire year of 2018, and over ocean for May 2018 only, due to computational resource limitations and the relatively lower complexity of aerosol retrievals over ocean. The generated retrieval products were validated against the Aerosol Robotic Network (AERONET) measurements and were also intercompared with the Moderate Resolution Imaging Spectroradiometer (MODIS) surface products. Overall, the validation analysis shows robust agreement of AHI/GRASP spectral AOD product with AERONET with correlation coefficients of 0.82–0.93 across the spectrum over land. The AHI/GRASP results demonstrate encouraging agreement with AERONET that is with 34.4 % of the AOD (510 nm) satisfying the Global Climate Observing System (GCOS) requirement, and a bias within ±0.02 for AOD over land. The validation for fine and coarse mode AOD also showed promising results with a correlation of 0.89 and mean bias of 0.04 for fine mode AOD when compared with AERONET measurements. As for the intercomparisons with MODIS products, the overall performance is quite comparable to MODIS surface products. In addition to the analysis of AHI/Himawari-8 alone retrieval, this study demonstrated a novel synergetic retrieval between AHI/Himawari-8 and micro-pulse lidar (MPL). Using this synergy resulted in further improvements of the aerosol retrievals especially over the low AOD conditions due to the improved sensitivity to aerosol.

explanation: 该论文介绍了一种名为TPC-TOSS的新型机载双平台系统，用于测量对流层顶的大气成分。该系统在2024年6月的TPEx I实验中使用，通过Learjet飞机搭载，能够高分辨率地原位测量臭氧、气溶胶以及关键气象参数。实验结果显示，该系统能够有效观测对流层顶附近的梯度变化，揭示了该区域活跃的混合和传输过程。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及大气成分的分析和使用机载传感器进行原位测量，以研究大气过程。
topic_words: ['atmospheric composition', 'ozone', 'aerosol', 'tropopause', 'in-situ measurements', 'airborne sensor', 'temperature gradients', 'mixing and transport processes']
authors: Heiko Bozem;Philipp Joppe;Yun Li;Nicolas Emig;Armin Afchine;Anna Breuninger;Joachim Curtius;Stefan Hofmann;Sadath Ismayil;Konrad Kandler;Daniel Kunkel;Arthur Kutschka;Hans-Christoph Lachnitt;Andreas Petzold;Sarah Richter;Timo Röschenthaler;Christian Rolf;Lisa Schneider;Johannes Schneider;Alexander Vogel;Peter Hoor
title: The TropoPause Composition TOwed Sensor Shuttle (TPC-TOSS): a new airborne dual platform approach for atmospheric composition measurements at the tropopause
abstract:
Deployed on a Learjet as a tandem measurement platform during the TPEx I (TropoPause composition gradients and mixing Experiment) campaign in June 2024, the new TPC-TOSS (TropoPause Composition Towed Sensor Shuttle) system delivers high-resolution in situ data on ozone, aerosol, and key meteorological parameters. Laboratory and in-flight tests confirmed its precision and stability. Observed gradients near the tropopause reveal active mixing and transport processes in the tropopause region. 
 In this paper we introduce the new TropoPause Composition TOwed Sensor Shuttle (TPC-TOSS), which constitutes an advanced development of the AIRcraft TOwed Sensor Shuttle (AIRTOSS), introduced by Frey et al. (2009). As part of a tandem measurement platform with a Learjet 35A, both platforms were equipped with redundant instruments for co-located measurements of aerosol size distribution (Ultra-High Sensitivity Aerosol Spectrometer, UHSAS), ozone (2BTech model 205), cloud particles (Back-Scatter Cloud Probe, BCP), as well as relative humidity, temperature and pressure. To measure the exact position of the two platforms as well as the relative distance of the TPC-TOSS to the Learjet a Global Positioning System (GPS) is installed on both platforms. Two identical Inertial Navigation Systems (INS) further allow to monitor attitude angles (roll, pitch, and heading) and accelerations. Laboratory tests before and ground tests as well as in-flight tests during the intensive operation period show a good agreement of the ozone and temperature measurements of better than 4.2 ppbv +1.1 % (ozone) and 0.5 °C (temperature) at a noise level of ± (2 ppbv + 0.5 %) for 2 s data (ozone) and ± 0.1 K for 1 Hz data (temperature). Stability of the ozone monitor mounted in the TPC-TOSS has been tested and is estimated to be 2.2 ppbv (offset, 1σ) and 0.7 % (gain, 1σ), respectively, based on the drift of offset and gain during regular calibrations between measurement flights in the two weeks operation period. The new TPC-TOSS was successfully flown during the TPEx I (TropoPause composition gradients and mixing Experiment) mission in June 2024 and performed four flights covering the altitude range between 6.4 and 10.9 km. The tropopause was crossed several times as evident from different temperature and ozone gradients as well as gradients of the aerosol number concentration. With the setup we are able to resolve transient stability and composition gradients ranging from almost zero or even negative to strong positive gradients of up to 25 K km−1 for potential temperature and from inverted to strong positive vertical gradients of ozone of up to 800 ppbv km−1, respectively. These gradients are caused by transport and mixing due to convection or shear induced turbulence at the tropopause.

explanation: 该研究开发了一个针对中国的异戊二烯排放模型（SieMAC），结合了更新的植被数据、本地测量和卫星数据，以改进生物源排放的估算。该模型旨在提高对中国地区异戊二烯排放的预测精度，并评估其对臭氧污染的影响。研究结果表明，与现有模型相比，SieMAC模型表现更好，揭示了异戊二烯对中国东部臭氧污染的潜在影响被低估。该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它利用卫星数据进行模型输入和验证，并关注大气成分分析和空气质量监测。
topic_words: ['isoprene emissions', 'biogenic VOCs', 'air quality monitoring', 'satellite data', 'HCHO', 'ozone pollution', 'MEGAN algorithm']
authors: Shengjun Xi;Yuhang Wang;Xiangyang Yuan;Zhaozhong Feng;Fanghe Zhao;Yanli Zhang;Xinming Wang
title: The Speciated isoprene emission model with  the MEGAN algorithm for China (SieMAC)
abstract:
We developed the Speciated Isoprene Emission Model with Model of Emissions of Gases and Aerosols from Nature Algorithm for China to improve biogenic emission estimates using updated vegetation data and local measurements. The model predicts summer 2013 emissions of 10.92–11.37 teragrams of carbon. Validation shows our model performs better than the existing models, revealing underestimated isoprene impacts on ozone pollution in eastern China. 
 Isoprene is the dominant non-methane Volatile Organic Compound (VOC) emitted from terrestrial ecosystems and plays an important role in ozone chemistry. Understanding isoprene emissions is critical for controlling air pollution. The Model of Emissions of Gases and Aerosols from Nature (MEGAN) is widely used to calculate biogenic isoprene emissions worldwide. While MEGAN predictions are good for many regions, a previous analysis of isoprene observations around China showed large discrepancies between observed and simulated isoprene concentrations. The uncertainties of isoprene emissions in China are also reflected in the large differences between MEGAN version 2.1 and 3.1. In this work, bottom-up high-resolution vegetation distributions and updated emission factors are combined with satellite data in the Speciated Isoprene Emission Model with the MEGAN Algorithm for China (SieMAC) to improve isoprene emission estimates in China. The results from this new emission inventory for summer 2013 improve upon MEGAN versions 2.1 and 3.1 when compared with isoprene observations and satellite HCHO products. This improved emission inventory is applied in a regional model, and the results indicate a potentially underestimated role of biogenic isoprene in ozone formation over polluted eastern China.

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明其关注气态活性氮氧化物的循环及其在驱动二次污染中的作用。活性氮氧化物是重要的大气污染物，研究它们的循环过程对于理解和预测空气质量至关重要。二次污染通常涉及大气中化学反应产生的污染物，因此该研究与大气成分分析密切相关。虽然标题和摘要没有明确提及遥感技术，但对这些气体及其循环的理解可以应用于空气质量监测和卫星观测数据的解释，从而支持利用遥感技术进行大气环境研究。

title: Identification of Sources of Methane in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

explanation: 该研究论文的标题和摘要表明，它关注使用多种观测方法量化垃圾填埋场甲烷排放的问题。甲烷是一种重要的温室气体，对大气环境有显著影响。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是大气成分分析方面。论文旨在比较不同的观测方法，以更准确地评估垃圾填埋场的甲烷排放量，这对于空气质量监测和制定减排策略至关重要。

title: Comparison of Landfill Methane Emission Quantification Using Multiple Observation Methods

explanation: 该研究论文分析了对流层上部和低层平流层（UTLS）中的臭氧变化趋势，并首次使用了动态坐标（等效纬度-位温）。研究结果表明，使用等效纬度-位温坐标可以提高UTLS趋势的一致性，减少热带地区的不确定性，并揭示南极春季南极极地低层平流层中显著的臭氧恢复趋势。这些趋势在使用地理坐标时无法捕捉到。该研究表明，等效纬度-位温坐标能够对化学臭氧趋势及其不确定性进行更具物理基础的解释，因为它考虑了臭氧的绝热输送。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及大气成分分析（特别是臭氧），并关注其变化趋势和影响因素。
topic_words: ['ozone trends', 'upper troposphere', 'lower stratosphere', 'atmospheric composition', 'Antarctic ozone recovery', 'dynamical coordinates', 'equivalent latitude', 'potential temperature']
authors: L. Millán;P. Hoor;M. I. Hegglin;G. L. Manney;P. S. Jeffery;F. M. Weyland;T. Leblanc;K. A. Walker;H. Boenisch;D. Kunkel;I. Petropavlovskikh;H. Ye
title: Ozone Trends in the Upper Troposphere‐Lower Stratosphere Using Equivalent Latitude‐Potential Temperature Coordinates
abstract: We analyze ozone trends in the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS, ∼ ${\sim} $300–50 hPa), using geographical (latitude‐pressure and latitude‐altitude) and, for the first time, dynamical (equivalent latitude‐potential temperature, EqL‐θ $\theta $) coordinates. Trends are determined using linear least squares fits, multiple linear regression, and dynamical linear modeling. Regardless of the method, EqL‐θ $\theta $ improves consistency between trends across the UTLS, reduces large UT tropical uncertainties, alters the magnitude of mid‐latitude trends, and, most notably, in the Southern polar lower stratosphere, reveals statistically significant trends exceeding 8% per decade during Antarctic Spring. This provides further evidence of Antarctic ozone recovery. These robust trends are not captured using geographical coordinates. We argue that EqL‐θ $\theta $ enables more physically grounded interpretations of chemical ozone trends and their uncertainties, as EqL‐θ $\theta $ accounts for the adiabatic (reversible) transport of ozone.

explanation: 该研究论文利用阿联酋火星任务的成像仪数据，分析了发生在火星亚马逊尼斯/阿卡迪亚地区的两次几乎相同的沙尘暴。论文关注沙尘暴的演变过程，时间范围是火星年的特定时间段。研究还分析了附近的冰云和大规模气象条件，探讨了沙尘暴形成的可能情景。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是卫星观测、大气成分分析（沙尘）和气象条件监测。
topic_words: ['dust storms', 'satellite observations', 'meteorological conditions', 'atmospheric composition (dust)', 'remote sensing (imaging)']
authors: Claus Gebhardt;Bijay Kumar Guha;Neha Gupta;Michael J. Wolff
title: Two Near‐Identical Dust Storms in Amazonis/Arcadia, Mars, and Nearby Low‐Pressure Systems—EMM/EXI Observations Constrain Possible Scenarios
abstract: The Emirates Mars Mission carries the Emirates eXploration Imager instrument, which captured hourly images on 15 and 24 September 2024. That is equivalent to Martian Year 37, solar longitude 329° and 335°, respectively. These observations recorded two nearly identical dust storms in the Amazonis/Arcadia region. We analyze the hour‐by‐hour evolution of both dust storms, using seven to eight unique images each. We track the onset and growth of the dust storms from around 10 through 16 local true solar time. We also analyze nearby water‐ice clouds and discuss large‐scale meteorological conditions. Both dust storms start in late morning, in or near the warm sector of a low pressure system. There is no evidence that the dust storms form directly on the associated cold front. There are different scenarios how dust storms form and develop. We show a specific scenario for two dust storms.

explanation: 该研究论文利用Aura卫星上的微波临边探测器（MLS）提供的17年痕量气体剖面数据，结合热带气旋（TC）的路径信息和环境数据，研究了热带气旋对上对流层和下平流层（UTLS）化学成分的影响。重点关注臭氧和水汽的变化，以及这些变化与热带气旋强度、距离气旋中心的距离以及环境风切变的关系。研究发现，热带气旋与UTLS中水汽增加和对流层顶脱水有关，同时上对流层臭氧减少。所有UTLS成分变化都对距离气旋中心的距离和气旋强度表现出显著的敏感性。此外，TC引起的UTLS水汽变化对环境切变幅度敏感，较弱的切变与更明显的对流层水合和对流层顶脱水有关。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是卫星观测和大气成分分析。
topic_words: ['UTLS composition', 'Ozone', 'Water vapor', 'Microwave Limb Sounder (MLS)', 'Aura satellite', 'Tropical cyclones', 'Stratosphere-troposphere exchange (STE)']
authors: Hannah E. Fagan;Cameron R. Homeyer
title: Upper Troposphere Lower Stratosphere Composition Change in Tropical Cyclones: Assessments From 17 Years of Satellite Observations
abstract: In addition to posing threats to life and property, tropical cyclones (TCs) can influence the chemical composition of the upper troposphere and lower stratosphere (UTLS). The transport of air between the troposphere and stratosphere, known as stratosphere‐troposphere exchange (STE), involves greenhouse gases such as ozone and water vapor whose impact on Earth's radiation budget and climate is most sensitive to changes in UTLS composition. Therefore, we examine observations of STE in TCs and relate these changes to TC and environmental characteristics. We utilize 17 years of trace gas profiles from the Microwave Limb Sounder aboard the Aura satellite in conjunction with TC track information and environmental data to relate UTLS ozone and water vapor changes to TC intensity, distance from TC center, and environmental wind shear. We find that accounting for varying tropopause heights and basin‐specific background composition is important to accurate assessment of UTLS composition changes within a TC. We also find that TCs are associated with increased water vapor throughout most of the UTLS and dehydration at tropopause level, while ozone is reduced greatly in the upper troposphere. All diagnosed UTLS composition changes demonstrate significant sensitivity to distance from TC center and TC intensity. Additionally, we find that TC‐induced UTLS water vapor changes are sensitive to environmental shear magnitude, where weaker shear is associated with more pronounced tropospheric hydration and tropopause dehydration.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注云 fraction 的预测，这与大气环境遥感技术密切相关。论文提出了一种改进的基于神经网络的尺度自适应云 fraction 方案，该方案利用 CloudSat 卫星的观测数据，并考虑了大气稳定性等因素，以提高云 fraction 预测的准确性。该方案旨在改进全球环流模型（GCMs）中云的表示，从而提高对云辐射效应和气候影响的模拟能力。虽然论文没有直接涉及空气质量监测或特定大气成分的分析，但它利用了卫星观测数据，并且其改进的云预测模型可以间接影响大气成分和气候模型的准确性。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术具有较强的相关性。
topic_words: ['Cloud fraction', 'CloudSat observations', 'Neural network', 'Atmospheric stability', 'Cloud area fraction', 'Cloud volume fraction', 'General Circulation Models (GCMs)', 'Cloud radiative effects', 'Satellite Observations']
authors: Qinyu Fan;Guoxing Chen;Hongtao Yang;Wei‐Chyung Wang;Yanhong Gao;Guangtao Dong
title: An Improved Neural Network‐Based Scale‐Adaptive Cloud Fraction Scheme: Incorporation of Atmospheric Stability
abstract: Cloud fraction, crucial to cloud climate effects, remains challenging to predict in general circulation models (GCMs). A neural network‐based scale‐adaptive cloud fraction scheme, predicting cloud area fraction that affects cloud radiative effects, was developed previously using CloudSat observations and demonstrated good performance in capturing cloud spatial distribution and vertical structure. This study further improves the scheme by considering in the inputs the atmospheric stability (affecting cloud formation and evolution) and introducing cloud volume fraction (important for cloud microphysics) as an additional output. Results show that including atmospheric stability significantly enhances both prediction accuracy and scale adaptability for cloud area fraction compared to the original scheme. On the test data set, root‐mean square errors (RMSEs) for liquid, mixed‐phase, and ice clouds are reduced by 15.5%, 11.6%, and 6.67%, respectively. These leads to better predictions of cloud area‐fraction vertical structure and spatial distribution, with RMSE reduced by 33% and 17% in those aspects. Notably, improvements are most pronounced for low‐level clouds, particularly in simulating the seasonal variation of stratocumulus over the Southeast Pacific and the cloud regime transitions along the Pacific Cross‐Section Intercomparison transect of the Global Energy and Water Cycle Experiment Cloud System Study/Working Group on Numerical Experimentation. The new scheme also performs well in predicting cloud volume fraction, showing accuracy and scale adaptability comparable to that for area fraction. Offline evaluations using simulation data from the FGOALS‐f3‐L GCM confirm the superiority of the updated scheme, highlighting its potential to improve cloud fraction representation and associated climate effects in GCMs.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了生物质燃烧气溶胶（BBA）作为冰核粒子（INP）在全球气候中的潜在重要性。论文使用全球气溶胶-气候模型模拟了BBA对云层冰晶形成的影响，并与矿物粉尘和海洋INP进行了比较。研究结果表明，在某些地区和季节，BBA可能与矿物粉尘和海洋INP一样重要。虽然论文没有直接提及遥感技术，但它关注的气溶胶类型和气候影响与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，例如，可以通过卫星观测来监测生物质燃烧的范围和强度，以及气溶胶的分布和性质。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术具有较强的相关性。
topic_words: ['biomass burning aerosols', 'ice nucleating particles', 'cloud glaciation', 'aerosol-climate model', 'air quality', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Kanishk Gohil;Noah Asch;Ryan Sullivan;Paul J. DeMott;Hamish Gordon
title: Global Simulations Suggest Biomass Burning Aerosol Emissions From Grassland Fires Could Be Important Ice Nucleating Particles
abstract: Ice nucleating particles (INP) capable of nucleating ice crystals via immersion freezing at temperatures above approximately −35°C may strongly influence cloud glaciation, with implications for global precipitation and climate feedback. In addition to mineral dust, soil dust, and marine organics, laboratory and field measurements suggest biomass burning aerosols (BBA) can act as immersion‐mode INP between around −30°C and −15°C. However, the contribution of BBA to the global INP budget remains poorly understood due to poor knowledge of which fuels yield INPs, uncertainties in global coverage of those fuels, and unknown size distributions of the INPs in the BBA. Nonetheless, with some understanding of these uncertainties from sensitivity studies, the relative importance of ice nucleation activity of BBA compared to other INP sources can be quantified. In this work, we investigate the potential global importance of BBA as INP using a global aerosol‐climate model, specifically the UK Met Office Unified Model (UM). We evaluate the model using field campaign data sets. We examine potential uncertainties in fuel types and particle sizes on BBA‐based INP concentrations. Averaged over June–September between 15°S and 50°S, BBA is a more important INP than dust and marine INP about 30% of the time at altitudes with temperatures between −30°C and −20°C. Our simulations therefore suggest BBA INPs may be at least as important as mineral dust and marine INP over the atmospheric regions and seasons where grassland fires are frequent.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注全球土壤中汞的挥发通量，这是一个大气汞循环的关键组成部分。论文开发了一个基于过程的双向交换模型（GSEM），用于预测全球土壤汞的排放量。该模型考虑了光化学和非光化学的氧化还原反应、土壤-水分分配以及气体扩散等关键过程。通过使用全球观测数据约束模型输出，研究表明，GSEM模型在复制通量方面表现更好，并提供了改进的全球估算。排放热点主要集中在热带地区，如亚马逊盆地、中非、东南亚和东亚。模拟通量的纬度变化与全球土壤呼吸模式密切相关。虽然论文没有直接提及遥感技术，但其研究结果对于理解大气成分（特别是汞）的全球分布和循环至关重要，这与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测和大气成分分析）密切相关。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术具有很强的相关性。
topic_words: ['air-soil exchange', 'elemental mercury', 'Hg0 volatilization fluxes', 'global atmospheric Hg cycle', 'photochemical redox reactions', 'non-photochemical redox reactions', 'soil respiration', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Qi Zhou;Zeng Xu;Qinzheng Chen;Yanping Zhang;Xiao Zhang;Yuzhe Shen;Danyu Wang;Long Chen
title: Improved Model Predictions of Global Soil Mercury Volatilization Fluxes
abstract: The air‐soil exchange of elemental mercury (Hg0) is a crucial component of the global atmospheric Hg cycle, yet current estimates of soil Hg0 volatilization fluxes remain highly uncertain. Previous studies have largely relied on empirical curve models, which have not been systematically validated against global‐scale observational fluxes. Here, we developed a process‐based bidirectional exchange model (GSEM) to predict global soil Hg0 emissions. The model incorporates key processes, including photochemical and non‐photochemical redox reactions, soil‐water partitioning, and gaseous diffusion. By constraining model outputs with global observations, we demonstrate that four mainstream empirical curve models underestimate air‐soil Hg0 exchange fluxes, while the GSEM model offers improved performance in replicating the fluxes and yields an improved global estimate of 2272.3 Mg yr−1. Emission hotspots are primarily concentrated in tropical regions such as the Amazon Basin, Central Africa, Southeast Asia, and East Asia, and the latitudinal variations in simulated fluxes closely align with global soil respiration patterns. This process‐based approach significantly enhances the accuracy of air‐soil Hg0 exchange predictions and contributes to reducing uncertainty in global Hg budget assessments.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注利用卫星和地面观测数据，结合多种自上而下的方法，对人为排放源进行及时的更新，并与自下而上的国家排放清单进行比较。论文重点关注了氮氧化物（NOx）的排放，并利用TROPOMI卫星数据和地面观测数据（AQS）来更新排放清单，从而提高臭氧（O3）预测的准确性。研究表明，通过近实时地面和卫星观测数据快速更新排放清单，可以减少化学传输模型中关键的排放不确定性来源。因此，该论文与大气环境遥感技术，如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等，密切相关。
topic_words: ['air quality monitoring', 'satellite observations', 'atmospheric composition analysis', 'anthropogenic emission', 'nitrogen oxide (NOx)', 'ozone (O3)', 'TROPOMI', 'emission inventory', 'chemical transport modeling']
authors: Siqi Ma;Fei Liu;Jia Xing;Bok H. Baek;Chi‐Tsan Wang;Yunyao Li;Yang Zhang;Daniel Tong
title: Timely Updates of Anthropogenic Emission With Satellite and Ground Observations: Comparison of Multiple Top‐Down Methods Against Bottom‐Up National Emission Inventories
abstract: Due to the COVID‐19 pandemic and changes in technology and energy consumption, recent years saw substantial variations in air pollution emissions, highlighting the importance of timely emission updates. In the United States, the level of surface ozone in many regions is close to the National Ambient Air Quality Standard, making it important to understand even small changes in emissions. Subsequently, model simulations of ozone are less tolerant of uncertainties in emission estimation, such as those caused by outdated emission updates. Here, we propose and assess four emission refresh methods: state‐level emission adjustment (ADJ), ADJ with budget‐aware urban adjustment (BA), ADJ with TROPOMI‐derived city emissions (SatNOx), and an approach with a machine learning product generated by Variational AutoEncorder (VAE). The observed temporal trends from ground measurements Air Quality System (AQS) and TROPOMI products are employed to provide updates of anthropogenic nitrogen oxide (NOx) emissions from a base year (2019) to the targeted model period (2020). The adjusted emissions effectively reflect the decrease in summer from 2019 to 2020. Comparisons of the ozone forecasts using the base and refreshed emission inputs show that the emission adjustments have reduced model mean biases by 19%–21% and enhanced the model's capability to forecast O3 surface concentrations. The nitrogen dioxide (NO2) predicted with updated emissions shows more underestimation at the surface and aloft due to lower baseline emissions. This work demonstrates the potential of using near‐real‐time ground and satellite observations to rapidly update emissions to reduce a key source of emission uncertainty in chemical transport modeling.

explanation: 该研究论文探讨了利用卫星搭载的微波湿度探测器（MWHS-II）上的118 GHz和183 GHz通道数据，通过全天候辐射同化技术，对台风“利奇马”的结构和强度进行分析和预报。研究重点在于不同频率通道对不同类型水凝物（如液态和固态水凝物）的敏感性差异，以及联合同化这些通道数据如何改进台风的分析和预报能力。虽然该研究主要关注台风，但其核心技术是大气遥感，特别是利用卫星观测数据反演大气中的水凝物分布，这与大气环境遥感技术在监测大气成分方面有一定的关联性。
topic_words: ['satellite observations', 'microwave remote sensing', 'hydrometeors', 'tropical cyclone', 'MWHS-II', 'all-sky radiance assimilation']
authors: Luyao Qin;Xiaoping Cheng;Jianfang Fei;Yaodeng Chen;Xiaogang Huang
title: Sensitivity Differences Between 118 GHz and 183 GHz Radiance in All‐Sky Assimilation With Hydrometeor Control Variables and the Impact on a Typhoon Structure Forecast
abstract: All‐sky microwave radiance assimilation plays a crucial role in numerical weather prediction, with the 183 GHz absorption band recognized for its strong sensitivity to humidity and clouds, and the 118 GHz absorption band primarily responsive to temperature but also sensitive to hydrometeors. The Microwave Humidity Sounder‐II (MWHS‐II) aboard the FengYun‐3 satellite includes channels near both bands, offering complementary capabilities. Although the assimilation performances of instrument channels in these bands have been studied, their comparative impacts on hydrometeor fields remain insufficiently explored. Through the separate and joint assimilation of 118 and 183 GHz MWHS‐II channels using hydrometeor control variables, this study investigates how directly adjusting hydrometeor analysis for thermodynamic consistency influences the analysis and forecasting of Typhoon Lekima (2019). Results show that the 183 GHz band has higher sensitivity to solid hydrometeors at higher levels, whereas the 118 GHz band is more sensitive to liquid hydrometeors at lower levels. These differences are clearly manifested in the hydrometeor analysis. Joint assimilation of both sets of channels improves the representation of temperature, humidity, and hydrometeor distribution. This not only enhances the analysis and forecasting of typhoon intensity but also deepens the understanding of typhoon structure. In particular, the sensitivity of the 183 GHz band to solid hydrometeors provides valuable insights into their role in the secondary eyewall formation for Typhoon Lekima (2019). With the use of hydrometeor control variables, the synergistic assimilation of MWHS‐II channels demonstrates potential for advancing tropical cyclone analysis, forecasting, and understanding of dynamics.

explanation: 该研究探讨了空气污染对气候因素与手足口病（HFMD）之间关系的影响。研究发现，PM2.5、SO2和O3等空气污染物会显著改变气候因素对HFMD发病率的影响。例如，PM2.5和SO2在较高温度下会增加HFMD的风险，而O3则降低风险。该研究强调了空气污染对HFMD风险的调节作用，并指出这种调节作用因性别、年龄和地点而异。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但其对空气污染物的关注以及对空气污染物与疾病之间关系的量化分析，与大气环境遥感技术在空气质量监测和大气成分分析方面的应用密切相关。
topic_words: ['air pollution', 'PM2.5', 'SO2', 'O3', 'NO2', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition']
authors: Xin Liu;Ziying Chen;Huan Fan;Ruiyun Li;Zhe Lou;Hong Ji;Jianli Hu
title: Impact of Air Pollution in Modifying the Relationship Between Climatic Variables and Hand, Foot and Mouth Disease: A Multi‐City Time Series Study in Jiangsu Province, China
abstract: Previous research has primarily focused on the impact of climatic variables and air pollution on Hand, Foot, and Mouth Disease (HFMD). However, there remains limited understanding of how air pollution levels modify these relationships across different regions and populations. This study employed a two‐stage, multi‐city time‐series analysis using data from 13 cities in Jiangsu Province (2015–2023) to explore these effects. A multistage analytical approach, including the distributed lag non‐linear model, multivariate meta‐regression, and attributable risk calculation, was used to quantify the association between climatic variables, air pollutants, and HFMD. Findings indicated that HFMD incidence is closely associated with meteorological conditions, with peak risk at 24.8°C for average temperature and 89.2% for average relative humidity. Low average wind speed and short sunshine hours (SH) also contributed to increased risk. Air pollutants, such as PM2.5, SO2, and O3, significantly modified these associations. For example, PM2.5 and SO2 increased HFMD risk at higher temperatures, while O3 reduced risk. Under low humidity, some pollutants exhibited protective effects, though risk increased with high humidity. NO2 had the strongest influence in reducing variability, while high PM2.5 and SO2 concentrations weakened the protective effects of SH. These findings emphasize the non‐linear influence of climatic variables on HFMD risk and suggest that air pollution's modification of these relationships varies by gender, age, and location. This provides important insights for developing targeted, timely public health warnings.

explanation: 该研究论文分析了21世纪初中国沿海海雾频率异常增加的现象，并探讨了气溶胶的影响。研究发现，海雾频率在2001-2011年期间显著增加，而气溶胶是主要驱动因素，它们通过辐射冷却增强大气稳定性，并作为云凝结核促进水汽凝结。这项研究强调了气溶胶在增加海雾频率中的关键作用，并强调了在中国持续减排以减轻与雾相关的干扰的必要性。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，因为它涉及气溶胶的监测和对大气成分的影响分析，这些都可以通过卫星观测和空气质量监测技术来实现。
topic_words: ['aerosols', 'air quality', 'cloud condensation nuclei', 'radiative cooling', 'CMIP6 model simulations', 'emission reduction']
authors: Xinyan Li;Fan Wang;Xiaorui Zhang;Pak Wai Chan;Yuanjian Yang;Chunsong Lu;Meng Gao
title: Anomalous increase in sea fog frequency along coastal China in the early 21st century and the aerosol influence
abstract:
Anomalous increase in sea fog frequency along coastal China in the early 21st century and the aerosol influence 
 Sea fog hampers coastal activities, yet its decadal variability in coastal China remains insufficiently characterized. Using hourly marine observations from the International Comprehensive Ocean-Atmosphere Data Set (ICOADS), we identify an April–July sea fog frequency (SFF) trend reversal over fog-prone eastern coastal China: from a decrease of 1% per decade (1980–2000) to an increase of 3% per decade (2001–2011) (p < 0.01 for both trends). Hourly ERA5 reanalysis corroborates this reversal and links it to enhanced 2001–2011 near‑surface cooling, which strengthens near-surface inversions and stability. Daily CMIP6 model simulations indicate that aerosols are the primary driver of the 2001–2011 SFF increase, enhancing stability through radiative cooling and promoting water vapor condensation by supplying cloud condensation nuclei. Our findings highlight aerosols’ critical role in increasing SFF and underscore the need for sustained emission-reduction efforts in China to mitigate fog-related disruptions.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注沿海地区PM10和PM2.5污染事件的关键影响因素，以及相关的颗粒物化学成分和混合状态。研究利用SEM-EDX分析了大量单个颗粒物的成分，揭示了气溶胶成分的高度异质性，并探讨了气象因素（如海风和再循环）对污染物扩散和老化的影响。虽然论文没有直接提及卫星观测或特定的遥感技术，但其对大气成分（特别是颗粒物）的分析与空气质量监测密切相关，因此可以认为与大气环境遥感技术有较强的关联性，特别是涉及到地面观测数据用于验证或补充遥感数据时。
topic_words: ['PM10', 'PM2.5', 'air quality monitoring', 'atmospheric composition', 'particle chemical composition', 'mixing state', 'aerosol composition', 'sea salt', 'carbonaceous particles', 'sulfur secondary species', 'calcium', 'meteorological effects', 'sea breezes', 'recirculation periods']
authors: Andebo Waza;Alexandre Deguine;Soulemane Ngagine;Pascal Flament;Patrick Augustin;Fabrice Cazier;Hervé Delbarre;Dorothée Dewaele;Elsa Dieudonne;Marc Fourmentin;Karine Deboudt
title: Critical factors influencing PM<sub>10</sub> and PM<sub>2.5</sub> pollution episodes and their associated particle chemical composition and mixing state in a coastal multisources area
abstract:
•PM2.5pollution plumes are frequently regional in extent, while PM10plumes are more local. •A highly heterogeneous composition of particles is observed on pollution days. •During pollution days, particle composition and mixing state change quickly due to local meteorological effects. •Sea breezes and recirculation periods strongly impact pollutant dispersion and ageing in coastal area. 
 In Europe, a large proportion of the population lives in industrial and urban coastal areas, due to their role as hubs of population migration and economic activity. Despite regulatory efforts, these areas frequently experience PM10 and PM2.5 pollution episodes due to the high density of emission sources combined with complex atmospheric dynamics. In this context, we investigate pollution days (PDs) over a 4-year period (2018–2021) on the Great Dunkirk Area, a coastal region significantly affected by diverse pollution sources. We show that PM2.5 pollution plumes predominantly exhibit regional extension, while PM10 plumes are more often local, with clear seasonal patterns. Using SEM-EDX analysis of over 23,000 individual particles collected during the 2021 MIXTAPE campaign, we reveal a highly heterogeneous aerosol composition, dominated by sea salt and carbonaceous particles, with fine particles enriched in sulfur secondary species and coarse particles in calcium. The mixing state index (χ) ranges from 0.5 to 0.9, indicating a continuum from external to internal mixtures, strongly influenced by atmospheric ageing, recirculation, and turbulent mixing. Our results highlight that neither local wind direction nor plume extension alone can explain the observed chemical variability. Instead, the evolution of particle composition and mixing state depends on fine-scale meteorological dynamics including sea breezes and recirculation periods affecting pollutant dispersion and ageing. This work underlines the need to incorporate high-resolution particle chemistry and urban-scale atmospheric dynamics in air quality assessments and demonstrates the added value of single-particle analysis in complex, multisource coastal environments.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注泰国一个热带干燥落叶林中PM2.5的浓度特征。研究利用地面观测数据和卫星气溶胶光学厚度（AOD）来分析PM2.5的来源和组成，包括城市空气污染的远距离传输和森林火灾的影响。论文分析了不同时期PM2.5中水溶性无机离子的成分变化，以识别空气污染的来源。因此，该研究与大气环境遥感技术密切相关，特别是空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析等方面。
topic_words: ['PM2.5', 'Air Quality Monitoring', 'Aerosol Optical Depth (AOD)', 'Satellite Observations', 'Atmospheric Composition Analysis', 'Biomass Burning Aerosols', 'Long-range Transport', 'Water-soluble Inorganic Ions (WSII)']
authors: Mao Xu;Phuvasa Chanonmuang;Syuichi Itahashi;Hiroyuki Sase;Kazuhide Matsuda
title: Characteristics of PM<sub>2.5</sub> concentrations in a tropical dry deciduous forest of Thailand: Forest fires and urban air pollution seriously affect air quality in forest ecosystems
abstract:
•We measured PM2.5above a dry deciduous forest in a remote area of Thailand. •Forest fire altered typical PM2.5composition by generating biomass burning aerosols. •Forest served as a receptor of long-range transported urban/industrial air pollution. •Forest fire considerably raised PM2.5concentration and served as a large source. 
 Particulate matter with an aerodynamic diameter equal to or less than 2.5 μm (PM2.5) remains a serious issue in Asia. To address the lack of observational data and investigate the status of PM2.5 in the forests, we collected PM2.5 above a tropical dry deciduous forest in a remote area of northeastern Thailand during the dry season. Notably, a large-scale surface fire occurred at the forest site during the mid-dry season. We also analyzed the PM2.5 data collected by the Pollution Control Department of Thailand and the satellite-based aerosol optical depth (AOD) over Southeast Asia. Three episodes of elevated PM2.5 concentration were observed at the site. Based on the ground-based measurements and AOD, two episodes were attributable to the long-range transport from urban areas in Vietnam and Thailand. The proportion of SO42− increased in the two episodes, indicating SO42− was a key indicator for identifying the sources of air pollution. While NH4+, NO3−, and SO42− dominated approximately 83 % of the total concentration of water-soluble inorganic ions (WSII) during the non-fire periods, the forest fire substantially altered the chemical composition, with K+ and Cl− accounting for approximately 42 %. The maximum concentration of total WSII in PM2.5 during the forest fire period reached 88.0 μg m−3, which was approximately three times higher than that during the non-fire periods (26.4 μg m−3). The forest site served not only as a receptor of urban air pollution but also as a large source of PM2.5. Enhancing regional cooperation and forest management is necessary in this region.

explanation: 该研究论文关注的是京津冀地区空气污染和二氧化碳排放的协同效应及其驱动因素。它利用高分辨率排放清单和WRF-CAMx模型来量化不同部门对二氧化碳排放以及PM2.5和O3浓度的贡献。研究通过污染控制效率、弹性系数和耦合协调度等指标，系统评估了协同效应，并结合地理探测器分析和计量经济学模型揭示了这些协同效应的驱动机制。虽然没有直接提及遥感技术，但其对空气污染物（如PM2.5和臭氧）的监测和排放清单的依赖，暗示了遥感数据在支持排放清单编制和验证中的潜在应用，因此与大气环境遥感技术具有一定的相关性。
topic_words: ['air pollution', 'carbon emissions', 'PM2.5', 'ozone', 'emission inventories', 'air quality monitoring']
authors: Min Dong;Wenjiao Duan;Shuiyuan Cheng;Chuanda Wang;Xiaosong Hou
title: Synergistic effects and their driving factors of air pollution and carbon emissions in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei region during 2018–2022
abstract:
•Contributions of different sources and their synergies are quantified. •Driving factors and driving effects of synergies are explored. •Synergies and drivers exhibit spatiotemporal and sectoral heterogeneity. •Technological innovation and population have significant impacts on synergies. •Total energy consumption and energy intensity are key drivers of synergies. 
 Investigating the synergistic effects of air pollution and carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions and their influencing factors is crucial for developing more scientific environmental governance and climate change mitigation strategies. This study investigated spatiotemporal patterns of air pollutants and CO2 emissions in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei (BTH) region during two distinct phases (2018–2020 and 2020–2022). Through integration of high-resolution emission inventories with WRF-CAMx modeling, sectoral contributions to CO2 emissions and to PM2.5 and O3 concentrations were quantified. A systematic assessment of synergistic effects employed three metrics: pollution control efficiency, elasticity coefficients, and coupling coordination degree. Finally, geographic detector analysis combined with econometric modeling revealed driving mechanisms underlying these synergistic effects, incorporating spatial correlations and causal inference. The results indicated a continuous decline in air pollutants and CO2 emissions across most cities in the BTH region from 2018 to 2022, with notable heterogeneity in the synergistic effects contributed by different sectors. Fine particulate matter (PM2.5) and CO2 exhibited stronger synergistic effects compared to ozone (O3) and CO2. These effects were positively influenced by population size and negatively impacted by energy consumption intensity. Total standard energy consumption and energy consumption intensity had relatively greater influences. Furthermore, there were interaction effects between different influencing factors, including two-factor enhancement and nonlinear enhancement. This study provided valuable scientific insights for enhancing the synergistic management of environmental pollution alleviation and carbon emission control in future phases, and offered strategic guidance for more effective integration of air quality improvement and climate change mitigation efforts.

explanation: 该研究论文主要关注喜马拉雅山脉Gangotri冰川山谷上空的黑碳气溶胶特征。通过实地观测和气象数据，研究分析了黑碳的浓度、来源（化石燃料和生物质燃烧）、远距离传输路径以及对辐射强迫和大气加热率的影响。论文还利用了CALIPSO卫星的观测数据来辅助分析黑碳粒子的传输路径。虽然研究侧重于地面观测，但也结合了卫星数据，因此与大气环境遥感技术（如空气质量监测、卫星观测和大气成分分析）有较强的相关性。
topic_words: ['black carbon aerosol', 'radiative forcing', 'long-range transport', 'fossil fuel emissions', 'biomass burning', 'CALIPSO', 'atmospheric heating rate']
authors: Abhishek Thakur;Chhavi P. Pandey;Aman Shrivas;Atul K. Srivastava;Pyar S. Negi
title: Black carbon aerosol characteristics over Gangotri glacier valley in North-Western Himalaya: Long-range transport and implications to radiative forcing
abstract:
•In-situ observations recorded mean eBC concentration of 0.28 ± 0.21 μg/m3at the high-altitude Himalayan site, Bhojbasa (∼3800 m amsl). •eBC induced radiative forcing (+6.71 ± 1.80 W/m² ) caused substantial warming in the atmosphere with a heating rate of 0.19 ± 0.05 K/day in this sensitive Himalayan region. •Long-range transport from IGP, impact of westerlies, and monsoonal transport, can be seen. •Fossil fuel emissions dominate eBC sources (78 %), while meteorological parameters strongly influence the eBC variations. 
 The Himalayan glacier valleys are encountering escalating environmental challenges. One of the contributing factors is thought to be the rising amounts of light-absorbing carbonaceous aerosols, particularly brown carbon (BrC) and black carbon (BC), that are reaching glacier valleys. The present study examines the optical and radiative characteristics of BC at Bhojbasa, near Gaumukh (∼3800amsl).
